\title{Face Recognition App}
\date{Sep 27, 2020}
\release{1.0}
\author{Łukasz Sawicki}
\newcommand{\sphinxlogo}{\vbox{}}
\renewcommand{\releasename}{Release}
\makeindex
\begin{document}

\pagestyle{empty}
\sphinxmaketitle
\pagestyle{plain}
\sphinxtableofcontents
\pagestyle{normal}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index::doc}}


This Face Recognition App could be use as security system based on cameras looking at people who want to enter different rooms (locations). Each person could have different levels of access to different locations. Main goal of this app is to recognize who wants to enter room and to check is that person has access to this particular location.


\chapter{Face Recognition App}
\label{\detokenize{modules:face-recognition-app}}\label{\detokenize{modules::doc}}

\section{App run module}
\label{\detokenize{main:module-main}}\label{\detokenize{main:app-run-module}}\label{\detokenize{main::doc}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!main@\spxentry{main}}\index{main@\spxentry{main}!module@\spxentry{module}}
\begin{DUlineblock}{0em}
\item[] The core module of Face Recognition App
\item[] You can run app from command line by typing
\item[] python main.py \sphinxhyphen{}e path\_to\_encoded\_faces.pickle \sphinxhyphen{}d detect\_method
\item[] detect\_method is one of ‘hog’ or ‘cnn’
\end{DUlineblock}
\index{main() (in module main)@\spxentry{main()}\spxextra{in module main}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{main:main.main}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{main.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{main}}}{}{}~
\begin{DUlineblock}{0em}
\item[] Inside main function CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier is started to maintain camera and face recognizer module
\end{DUlineblock}

\end{fulllineitems}



\section{Access}

\subsection{AccesAfterTime module}
\label{\detokenize{doc/Access/AccesAfterTime:module-AccesAfterTime}}\label{\detokenize{doc/Access/AccesAfterTime:accesaftertime-module}}\label{\detokenize{doc/Access/AccesAfterTime::doc}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!AccesAfterTime@\spxentry{AccesAfterTime}}\index{AccesAfterTime@\spxentry{AccesAfterTime}!module@\spxentry{module}}\index{AccessAfterTime (class in AccesAfterTime)@\spxentry{AccessAfterTime}\spxextra{class in AccesAfterTime}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/Access/AccesAfterTime:AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{AccesAfterTime.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{AccessAfterTime}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{min\_time}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{2.5}}}{}
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{object}}

\begin{DUlineblock}{0em}
\item[] This class provide access while person is recognized for X seconds
\item[] If access is granted, it is log into log file
\item[] If access is not granted or person is Unknown, screenshot is taken and this situation is also logged
\end{DUlineblock}
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{min\_time}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}) \textendash{} minimum amount of time a person must be recognized to gain access.

\end{description}\end{quote}
\index{access\_after\_time() (AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime method)@\spxentry{access\_after\_time()}\spxextra{AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/Access/AccesAfterTime:AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime.access_after_time}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{access\_after\_time}}}{}{}
Calculate person ratio in last min\_time period. Ratio =
score from get\_persons\_from\_frame / frames read in min\_time period.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
with access and without access.

\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
2 list of persons

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{access\_in\_location() (AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime method)@\spxentry{access\_in\_location()}\spxextra{AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/Access/AccesAfterTime:AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime.access_in_location}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{access\_in\_location}}}{}{}~\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
True if access is grant in given location

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{check\_time() (AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime method)@\spxentry{check\_time()}\spxextra{AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/Access/AccesAfterTime:AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime.check_time}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{check\_time}}}{}{}~\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
True if min\_time passed.

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{get\_persons\_from\_frame() (AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime method)@\spxentry{get\_persons\_from\_frame()}\spxextra{AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/Access/AccesAfterTime:AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime.get_persons_from_frame}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{get\_persons\_from\_frame}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{names}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{access}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{frame}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{video\_stream}}}{}
If person is recognized on frame add this name to dict, where all names are kept. If person has
access add +1 in this name. If person don’t have access add \sphinxhyphen{}1 in this name. Names with negative value
of person\_ratio (access\_after\_time method) are recognized as persons without access.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{names}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}) \textendash{} list of names people on frame. Can contain ‘Unknown’ if person is not in known persons .pickle file.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{access}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}) \textendash{} list of tuples (Name, Access(True/False)). Used to measure person\_ratio.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{frame}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{numpy.ndarray}}) \textendash{} last frame with unknown or person with no access.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{video\_stream}} ({\hyperref[\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/WebCamStream:WebCamStream.WebCamStream}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{WebCamStream}}}}}) \textendash{} source of video.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{log\_access() (AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime method)@\spxentry{log\_access()}\spxextra{AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/Access/AccesAfterTime:AccesAfterTime.AccessAfterTime.log_access}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{log\_access}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{video\_stream}}}{}
If min\_time passed, save into log.txt file who get access or not. Also save from video stream
for person without access or unknown person. If someone get access location\_access variable.
is set to True. After 1sec is set to False.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{video\_stream}} ({\hyperref[\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/WebCamStream:WebCamStream.WebCamStream}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{WebCamStream}}}}}) \textendash{} source of video.

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}


\end{fulllineitems}

\section{VideoStream}

\subsection{CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier module}
\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier:module-CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier}}\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier:cameraandfacerecognizercarrier-module}}\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier::doc}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier@\spxentry{CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier}}\index{CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier@\spxentry{CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier}!module@\spxentry{module}}\index{CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier (class in CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier)@\spxentry{CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier}\spxextra{class in CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier:CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier.CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{camName}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{location}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{encodings}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{min\_time}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{src}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{0}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{detect\_method}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{\textquotesingle{}cnn\textquotesingle{}}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{scale}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{0.5}}}{}
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{object}}

This class is carrier for both WebCamStream and FaceRecognizer
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{camName}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} camera name.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{location}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} location of camera, use one Locations from Locations.py.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{encodings}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{dict}}) \textendash{} .pickle file with encoded faces.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{min\_time}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}) \textendash{} minimum amount of time a person must be recognized to gain access.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{src}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} camera stream source. 0 \sphinxhyphen{} hardware camera or URL of video stream. Default 0.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{detect\_method}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} method for face encoding ‘hog’ or ‘cnn’. Default ‘cnn’.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{scale}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}) \textendash{} frame scaling for face recognition, use 1.0 if you have powerful CPU or 0.5 for more FPS. Lower scale lowers recognition accuracy. Default 0.5.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
\index{is\_access\_granted() (CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier.CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier method)@\spxentry{is\_access\_granted()}\spxextra{CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier.CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier:CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier.CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier.is_access_granted}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{is\_access\_granted}}}{}{}~\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
True if access in camera’s location is granted

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{start\_carrier() (CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier.CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier method)@\spxentry{start\_carrier()}\spxextra{CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier.CameraAndFaceRecognizerCarrier method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}

\subsection{FrameCounter module}
\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/FrameCounter:module-FrameCounter}}\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/FrameCounter:framecounter-module}}\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/FrameCounter::doc}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!FrameCounter@\spxentry{FrameCounter}}\index{FrameCounter@\spxentry{FrameCounter}!module@\spxentry{module}}\index{FrameCounter (class in FrameCounter)@\spxentry{FrameCounter}\spxextra{class in FrameCounter}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/FrameCounter:FrameCounter.FrameCounter}}\pysigline{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{FrameCounter.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{FrameCounter}}}
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{object}}

This class contain number of read frames to calculate actual FPS. Read frames are set to 0 after calculating FPS
\index{calculate\_FPS() (FrameCounter.FrameCounter method)@\spxentry{calculate\_FPS()}\spxextra{FrameCounter.FrameCounter method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/FrameCounter:FrameCounter.FrameCounter.calculate_FPS}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{calculate\_FPS}}}{}{}
When minimum frames are read (minimum is set in class \_\_init\_\_ to 20),
they are divided by time passed since the last FPS count.

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{frame\_read() (FrameCounter.FrameCounter method)@\spxentry{frame\_read()}\spxextra{FrameCounter.FrameCounter method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/FrameCounter:FrameCounter.FrameCounter.frame_read}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{frame\_read}}}{}{}
Increment read frames by 1 while frame is read

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{get\_FPS() (FrameCounter.FrameCounter method)@\spxentry{get\_FPS()}\spxextra{FrameCounter.FrameCounter method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/FrameCounter:FrameCounter.FrameCounter.get_FPS}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{get\_FPS}}}{}{}~\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
FPS in video stream

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{reset\_frame\_read() (FrameCounter.FrameCounter method)@\spxentry{reset\_frame\_read()}\spxextra{FrameCounter.FrameCounter method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{doc/VideoStream/FrameCounter:FrameCounter.FrameCounter.reset_frame_read}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{reset\_frame\_read}}}{}{}

\end{fulllineitems}


\end{fulllineitems}
